INSERT INTO ACTCON_AL_LCR_BL_TRN (STR_BILL_CODE,STR_REQ_APP_NO,DT_REQ_APP_DATE ,NUM_DEPT_CODE,STR_HOD_CODE,STR_CONT_CODE ,STR_CURRENCY_CODE,STR_SUBJECT,STR_ORDER_NUMBER,DT_ORDER_DATE,STR_LETTER_NUMBER,DT_LETTER_DATE,STR_REFERENCE_NUMBER,DT_REFERENCE_DATE,NUM_LC_APPLICATION_AMOUNT,NUM_AMOUNT_TO_CREDIT,NUM_RATE,STR_LC_IN_WORDS,NUM_MARGIN_AMOUNT,NUM_RETIRMENT_COMMISSION,NUM_FOREIGN_BANK_COMMISSION,NUM_POSTAL_CHARGES,NUM_TOTAL_AMOUNT_DEDUCTED,STR_IN_WORDS,NUM_INTEREST_CREDITED,NUM_AMOUNT_CREDITED,NUM_NET_AMOUNT,STR_BILL_REF_NUMBER,DT_BILL_REF_DATE,STR_STATUS_CODE,STR_PARTICULARS,STR_REMARKS,STR_BILL_STATUS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO)(SELECT STR_BILL_CODE,STR_REQ_APP_NO,DT_REQ_APP_DATE ,NUM_DEPT_CODE,STR_HOD_CODE,STR_CONT_CODE ,STR_CURRENCY_CODE,STR_SUBJECT,STR_ORDER_NUMBER,DT_ORDER_DATE,STR_LETTER_NUMBER,DT_LETTER_DATE,STR_REFERENCE_NUMBER,DT_REFERENCE_DATE,NUM_LC_APPLICATION_AMOUNT,NUM_AMOUNT_TO_CREDIT,NUM_RATE,STR_LC_IN_WORDS,NUM_MARGIN_AMOUNT,NUM_RETIRMENT_COMMISSION,NUM_FOREIGN_BANK_COMMISSION,NUM_POSTAL_CHARGES,NUM_TOTAL_AMOUNT_DEDUCTED,STR_IN_WORDS,NUM_INTEREST_CREDITED,NUM_AMOUNT_CREDITED,NUM_NET_AMOUNT,STR_BILL_REF_NUMBER,DT_BILL_REF_DATE,STR_STATUS_CODE,STR_PARTICULARS,STR_REMARKS,STR_BILL_STATUS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTCON_AL_LCR_BL_TRN A where A.str_req_app_no=T.str_req_app_no and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) from ACTCON_LCR_BL_TRN t where STR_REQ_APP_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)
